page.title: 10CHURCHES
page.content: In our "BLOCK" there is only St.James Church at Thorpe Thewles.This is a Church of England Church, run by a vicar with three churches in his parish. As well as Anglicans there are many Non-Conformists, particularly Methodists and some Catholics.There is no sign of Asian{religions}owing to the lack of Asiatic or Eastern people. It is apparent that only few people attend church regularly and these are mainly middle aged and elderly. Of these several travel to the neighbouring towns of Norton,Stockton or Billingham to attend church. Young people,between eleven to twenty, seem to have no real religious{beliefs}and the vast majority do not attend church.
